rules_text:
Chosen one [i]({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token with haste. That token attacks this combat if able.
rules_text2:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste. That token attacks this combat if able.
